Articles.Content:
Hi,

I found the Kerbalx.com website, can I post my kerbalx crafts on the spacecraft exchange?

Thanks,

Kerbingamer376
Sure, I don't see why not

I fond it a good site especially if your craft has mods. When you go to download a craft it lists the mods it requires by scanning the parts in the craft so nothing gets forgotten.

Very handy.

errr, sorry for the late reply, only just saw this. Yeah absolutely, post your KerbalX craft on the forums and wherever you like!

If anyone has any KerbalX related questions feel free to PM me or ask in the KerbalX thread
